dev-docs/animal-detection/how_to_identif.title: How to identify any aquatic animal
dev-docs/animal-detection/how_to_identif.description: This guide explains how to use the Aquaware API to identify aquatic animal species based on uploaded images. The API is available only to users with the Premium Subscription Tier (Tier 2).

dev-docs/animal-disease-detection/how_to.title: How to check animals for diseases
dev-docs/animal-disease-detection/how_to.description: This guide explains how to use the Aquaware API to check fish for diseases based on uploaded images. The API is available only to users with the Premium Subscription Tier (Tier 2).

dev-docs/environment-management/adding-a.title: How to add an Environment
dev-docs/environment-management/adding-a.description: Adding an environment in Aquaware is simple and can be done either via the Aquaware app or through our API.

dev-docs/environment-management/delete-e.title: Delete an Environment
dev-docs/environment-management/delete-e.description: To delete an environment, you can use the following API endpoint:

dev-docs/environment-management/get-all-.title: Get All of My Environments
dev-docs/environment-management/get-all-.description: To retrieve a list of all the environments associated with your account, you can use the following API endpoint:

dev-docs/environment-management/get-publ.title: Get All Public Environments
dev-docs/environment-management/get-publ.description: To retrieve a list of all publicly available environments, you can use the following API endpoint:

dev-docs/environment-management/update-e.title: Update My Environment
dev-docs/environment-management/update-e.description: To update an environment that you have previously created, you can use the following API endpoint:

dev-docs/measurement-management/get_aler.title: Get Alert Settings
dev-docs/measurement-management/get_aler.description: Alerts are only available in the Advanced or Premium plan. You can retrieve the current alert threshold settings for any water parameter within your environment. Alerts will notify you via email when thresholds are crossed, sent to your registered email address.

dev-docs/measurement-management/get_all_.title: Get All Values From Parameter
dev-docs/measurement-management/get_all_.description: The Get All Values From Parameter endpoint allows you to retrieve all water values for a specific parameter in an environment. This is useful for monitoring trends over time, for example, checking how the pH level or temperature of the water has changed.

dev-docs/measurement-management/get_late.title: Get Latest Values from All Parameters

dev-docs/measurement-management/get_tota.title: Get Total Entries for a Parameter

dev-docs/measurement-management/save_ale.title: Save Alert Settings
dev-docs/measurement-management/save_ale.description: Alerts are only available in the Advanced or Premium plan. You can set threshold alerts for your water parameters through the API or directly in the app. Once set, alerts will notify you via email when a water parameter exceeds the defined threshold. The emails are sent to the account's registered email address.

dev-docs/user-management/create-an-accou.title: Create an Account
dev-docs/user-management/create-an-accou.description: Creating an account with Aquaware is simple and can be done in just a few steps. You can either sign up directly through our website or, directly through the app.

dev-docs/user-management/login.title: Login
dev-docs/user-management/login.description: To access your Aquaware account, you can log in either through our website, the app or programmatically using our API. After logging in, you'll receive an api key, which is crucial for future authorization.

dev-docs/user-management/profile.title: Profile
dev-docs/user-management/profile.description: The Aquaware API allows you to fetch details about your user profile using the /api/users/profile endpoint. This endpoint provides essential user information, such as email, name, account creation date, API key, and subscription tier.

getting-started/adding-water-values.title: Adding Water Parameters
getting-started/adding-water-values.description: To maintain accurate records of your aquatic environment, you can upload water parameters directly to your environment. Below, you'll find all the details you need to get started, including how to use your API Key and Environment ID, as well as how to send data using a POST request.

getting-started/create-an-account.title: Create an Account
getting-started/create-an-account.description: Welcome to Aquaware! Creating an account is the first step to unlocking the full potential of our platform. Follow this guide to set up your account quickly and securely.

getting-started/explore-the-dashboard.title: Explore the Dashboard
getting-started/explore-the-dashboard.description: Welcome to the Aquaware Dashboard! This is your central hub for managing your account, environments, and subscriptions. The dashboard is designed to make everything straightforward and intuitive, whether you’re updating your profile, adding water environments, or managing your plan.

getting-started/thank-you.title: Thank You for Choosing Aquaware!
getting-started/thank-you.description: I want to extend a heartfelt thank you for trusting Aquaware as your water monitoring solution. Your support means the world to me, and I am committed to continuously improving your experience with innovative features and reliable service.

getting-started/use-the-app.title: Use the Aquaware App
getting-started/use-the-app.description: Discover the convenience of monitoring your environments directly from your smartphone! With the Aquaware App, you can log in using the same credentials as your web dashboard and access all your environments in one place.

getting-started/welcome.title: Welcome to Aquaware
getting-started/welcome.description: I am thrilled to have you here! Aquaware is a platform created with love and care to make water monitoring and management simple, powerful, and accessible for everyone. Whether you’re a hobbyist, a researcher, professional, an organisation or someone just getting started, I am here to support your journey.
